name: Alan T. BROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Brooks v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Alan T. BROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED, and Appellant’s application for relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
941 A.2d 1255
Alan T. BROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 20, 2007.
